channel.title: Do I need to
channel.description:
Do I need to portforward for other people to come into my server.
My problem is my router is on my parents computer, and I can't portforward on mine because my parents don't want me to host on their computer.
If I don't have to portforward to let other people in, can someone tell how to let people in? I got no-ip, which doesn't seem to work, i also DynDNS, and that doesn't work either.
Please post with helpful information :)

item.title: Do I need to
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

unless u use hamachi and change the no-ip connection to the hamachi host and then it will run… problem
is that u cant put it on server status page =/ ffs

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need to
item.dc:creator: @Rockin Rockin
item.description:
@Rockin wrote:

dang, oh well i guess i’ll just host at a friends house

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need to
item.dc:creator: @Noob_Slayerz Noob Slayerz
item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:3, topic:156863”]ur parents = gays
problem is, u wont be able to let ppl on, with a router, that u cant port forwards sorry.[/quote]

First part was unnecessary… Sorry Rockin, you must portforward.

Read full topic

item.title: Do I need to

item.description:
@Noob_Slayerz wrote:

If you have a router you must portforward, for other people to be able to get on your server.

  • Noob Slayerz

Read full topic
